name: places/ChIJIUyqSyT2wokRLtwd7JcApbQ
adrFormatAddress: 2660 Broadway, New York, NY 10025-5026, USA

originalText.text: Best Copy & Shipping provided a quick quote and turnaround time, even when contacted via their website from overseas. Their costs were very fair and cheaper than any other print shop in the area. They were very helpful in my printing and large, last-minute order needs, and even sent me a video of the samples since we weren't able to proof them in person before. 10 out of 10 would recommend and use again! Thank you Nannu for all the help, it was very much appreciated.

originalText.text:
Got a passport photo here, the photo part of which was pretty quick and the service was professional though I could've used more direction from the clerk. The bigger issue was at checkout when I got charged a 4% credit card fee without being told. I looked around and didn't see any signs, they were able to reverse the charge and I paid in cash but the experience didn't make me feel good.

A couple months back I was trying to do a drop off return to a FedEx location and this place wouldn't accept it, even though I had the label/ envelope and everything all ready to go.

Update after the following response from owner: "Display I have sign for credit card fee. I did show you and you saw my sign. FedEx label may be not clear for scan. If your label was not correct. My all-other customer always drops off their packages."

They may have a sign, but I was neither shown it nor did I see it, why else would I charge and then ask for the charges to be reversed? Regarding the package that was not accepted, the FedEx label was very legible printout, and was not accepted as it was the "wrong type of shipping" according to the then-clerk. Review was 3/5 stars, now 2/5 for lying, terrible customer service.

originalText.text: Nannu and Best Copy and Shipping is truly the BEST! Two years in a row I've been in a bind with last minute conference material printouts for booklets and more. Nannu does what it takes to get the job done perfectly - always on time! Thank you

originalText.text: Super quality copy store in upper west side and has the best price value then other copy stores. Provides fast and reliable services. I just used their internet and computer as well as printing service for my job, absolutely perfect. After that I took my passport picture and used their FedEx shipping service and I'm very happy with the Best Copy and Shipping staff members and how they handled my shipping process. I recommend others to use their service and it's a one stop place for all for any copying, printing, and many other things that you might find valuable and important that others won't give you the same type of 5 star quality service.

originalText.text: We are a small tenants association and have used Best Copy for over fifteen years to print our flyers and quarterly newsletters. Best Copy has been a wonderful partner to work with. We send over pdf files and the work is produced and delivered within hours. The staff is pleasant and easy to work with. The cost is reasonable. We will continue our collaboration with Best Copy forever.
